solution_line_template: The total time taken for the whole journey is {end_hour}-{start_hour} = <<{end_hour}-{start_hour}={total_journey_hours}>>{total_journey_hours} hours.
The total time taken in minutes is {total_journey_hours}*{minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_journey_hours}*{minutes_per_hour}={total_journey_minutes}>>{total_journey_minutes} minutes.

If it takes {time_to_first_station} minutes to reach the first station, then the rest of the journey takes {total_journey_minutes} - {time_to_first_station} = <<{total_journey_minutes}-{time_to_first_station}={time_from_first_station_to_work}>>{time_from_first_station_to_work} minutes.
